message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can come to a better agreement. I would like to propose a price of $140 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell it for $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $155.
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but I still believe we can find a fair price. I would like to propose a price of $145 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to sell it for $145. I'm willing to compromise a bit more and offer it to you for $152.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in finding a middle ground. I would like to counter with an offer of $147.50 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to sell it for $147.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $151.25.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $149 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to sell it for $149. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $151.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I believe we can reach a better agreement. I would like to counter with an offer of $148 for the product.
